translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The forward and reverse order of conditions in relation to mental phenomena, and the text of the Paṭṭhāna with the triplets and couplets inserted

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)🔽17.30. Sanidassanattika, Upādinnattika🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādinnupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naupādinnupādāniyo🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, sahajāte cha …pe… avigate cha.🔽Sanidassanasappaṭigho anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo nasanidassanasappaṭighassa naanupādinnupādāniyassa
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya  sani dassana ttika upa ā dinna ttika  anidassana appaṭigham upādinnupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na upādinnupādāniyaḥ  dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha sahajāte cha pe avigate cha  sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ anupādinnupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ na sa nidassana sa paṭighassa na anupādinnupādāniyassa
translated: With physical form, with physical support,

original: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Ārammaṇe nava, anantare tīṇi …pe…🔽upanissaye purejāte nava …pe… avigate nava.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ anupādinnaanupādāniyaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho🔽naanupādinnaanupādāniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā
analyzed: dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta ārammaṇe nava anantare tīṇi pe 🔽upanissaye purejāte nava pe avigate nava 🔽anidassana appaṭigham anupādinna anupādāniyam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ 🔽na anupādinna anupādāniyaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha adhipatiyā
